definition: to kill with one's own hand
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Lee three practice martial arts, hand blade black gold.
sentences.chinese: 李三苦練武功，手刃黑金。

definition: to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
A debt of blood must be paid in blood./Blood calls for blood.
lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
to make mincemeat of sb/to hack sb to pieces (used while cursing)
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
(of enemies) cannot live under the same sky/absolutely irreconcilable
to nurse a grievance/to harbor a grudge
